Transformers: Battlemasters is a mobile boxing game for iOS and Android.

My role: Co-Director and Lead Game Designer

This project was done on contract for Hasbro, to support the release of a new toy line they were putting out in the Transformers universe. I served as Co-Director and Lead Game designer on the project, designing the mechanics of the game, managing our programming and art teams and delivering creative vision for the project.

The genesis of the project was in a novel motion control system for mobile devices that we were pitching to Hasbro. I helped prototype this system, using infrared LEDs and an IR-pass filter to provide a low cost motion control scheme that could work with mobile devices. Although the motion control component of the project never materialized due to hardware costing concerns, the proposal did yield a mobile title that would become Transformers: Battlemasters.

The game was built using the Unity 3D Engine and released in the Apple App Store for iOS and Google Play store for Android
